channel.title: A lil help thnx
channel.description: hey guys im just after how to change shop prices their aint no tuts on it well not in the tut list any ways so yer if some1 could tell me where they are thnx

item.title: A lil help thnx
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

wolfen your being stupid.
open item.cfg
find your shop
it should look sumthing like this…item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151 198945.35621087 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0 if you look at it… its actually like this…item = ITEMID Item_Description Price price price 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0 the rest is shit you dont need to worry about. it has 3 prices so that it can pinpoint exactly what your price should be, just put the exact price u want it to be in each one and it will end up sumwhere around it[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 04:52:14 AM[/size][hr]you dont need to get all technical.

Read full topic

item.title: A lil help thnx
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

Ah, well, then try this. I did a bit of looking myself.

  1. Open up your “client.java” and search for 1.26

  2. Keep searching of 1.26 and change each one to 1 (This is some kind of multiplier)

  3. Now, to physically alter the price of an item, go to “item.cfg” and after the shop name where you see the numbers. ( You know, 1 1 1 0 0 0 0 …) Change the first three.

  • For example, I did 100 100 100 for a Pot, the item pot. Now it’s worth 125 coins. So, I guess you can play around with it.

*I use the TestScape Source, and General Stores have a 1.25% price increase. (Which explains the 125 gp for a pot. In the Varrock General Store.) To fix that, search for 1.25 in the client.java. Change to 1.

  • After more testing, it seems that if you simply change all three numbers to the same price, it makes the item worth that price. For example, when I change the first three number for the pot to 250 250 250, it’s now worth 250 gp. If it’s 1 1 1 it’s worth 1 gp. If I do 100 100 100, it’s worth 100 gp. There you go=)

item.title: A lil help thnx
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

To change a shop price:

I’ll just give you an example.

  1. Open up Shops.cfg. (Using Notepad if you’d like.)

  2. Look around for the shop you are trying to change the price of an item in.

  3. If you see how on the top it repeats: Item, amount, item, amount… you should see this.

  4. Under the “item” spot, is the ID of the item. Then, next to it, under “amount,” is the price of that item.

  5. So to change the price, simply change what’s under the “amount” spot.

  • That was an explanation specifically for your question. If you want a little more information, like, for how to add your item and price or whatever, then check this out:
moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It’s an “Ultimate Guide” by Mod Taharok. It tells you in detail of what you can do. Just scroll down a little bit under Chapter 2 to find the information. Good Luck.
